titles.title: Restoring Trust in Regulator Travel Act
A bill to prohibit an entity under the jurisdiction of a Federal agency from paying for travel by employees of that agency.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 11/7/2007--Introduced. Restoring Trust in Regulator Travel Act - Prohibits a federal agency and its employees from accepting funding for travel from a nonfederal entity if such entity has been subject to the jurisdiction of that agency within two years of the travel.
